intro: Cybianthus crotonoides, commonly known as the Cape York beauty, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Rutaceae and is characterized by its showy, yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant has smooth, green leaves with a slightly waxy texture. It thrives in well-drained soils and prefers full sun to partial shade. Cybianthus crotonoides is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
